Key Match Events: Tonga's captain Hemaloto Polovili scored the first goal of the match with a well-taken finish, followed by a penalty conversion to double the lead. Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held in Apia, Tonga, and the result ensured their place in the final against the winner of the American Samoa vs Samoa match, with the winner advancing to the group stages of Round Two next month.
